validation.validation: Submit ledger accounts that use an account translation method marked for historic translation amounts for this company: [company]. This ledger account doesn't use an account translation method marked for historic translation amounts: [ledger account].
Submit only ledger accounts that aren't retired. This ledger account is retired: [ledger account].
Submit ledger accounts that aren't restricted from use by this company: [company]. The company you submitted is restricted from using this ledger account: [ledger account].
Submit ledger accounts that belong to the account set for this company: [company]. The account set for the company you submitted doesn't contain this ledger account: [ledger account].
Submit ledger accounts from ledger account security segments which you have access to. You don't have access to the ledger account security segment for this ledger account: [ledger account].
Submit only ledger accounts that are balance sheet accounts. This ledger account isn't a balance sheet account: [ledger account].

validation.description: The Interworktag Affiliate Type must be of the same type as defined for Balancing Worktags at the tenant level.

description: This Element stores criteria to resolve to a beginning balance journal based on Company, Fiscal Year, Ledger Type, and Book Code. Beginning Balance Translation Amounts are entered for a given Currency via the Beginning Balnace Translation Amount Replacement Data subelement.
